content.rendered:
Excess baggage:

  If baggage weight is exceeds baggage allowance 24kg but not above the maximum allowed weight and size (32kgs, 185cm) a charge of 12.00 EUR per extra kilo (or the equivalent in local currency) applies .

  If baggage size is exceeds baggage allowance 158cm but not above the allowed weight 24kgs, a charge of 100.00 EUR(or the equivalent in local currency ) applies, it can only be accepted when sufficient is available.

  For each extra piece of baggage not exceeding the maximum allowed weight and size 32kgs, 158cm a charge of 200.00 EUR (or the equivalent in local currency) applies.

For more details visit : http://www.afriqiyah airways.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Afriqiyah Airways Hand | Cabin Baggage

Afriqiyah Airways checked Baggage
